Description:
This web service searches for care plan problems in patient care plans.

Currently, this Search interaction supports only searching by _id. For this reason, CarePlan.Read should typically be used instead of this resource.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

Condition.Name: Condition
Condition.Description: An instance of the R4 Condition resource.

abatementDateTime.Name: abatementDateTime
abatementDateTime.Description: The date the condition was resolved.

clinicalStatus.Name: clinicalStatus
clinicalStatus.Description: The clinical status, which can be active, resolved, or inactive.

code.Name: code
code.Description: The display name for the condition.

note.Name: note
note.Description: Free text comments. Omitted when this resource is used in the patient context.

recordedDate.Name: recordedDate
recordedDate.Description: The date the condition was documented.

recorder.Name: recorder
recorder.Description: The practitioner who noted the condition.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient associated with the condition.
